message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $850,000 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $950,000.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  How about we split the difference from our last offers and settle at $900,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to go a bit higher than $900,000, but not much. I'm counteroffering at $925,000.
Alice, this is getting close to what I can do.  $910,000 is my final offer.
